creditline: Gift of David M. Daniels in memory of H. D. M. Grier
markings:
Stamp in red ink, LL [degas] Lugt 658
On verso: Stamp in red ink, LR [ATÉLIER ED. DEGAS] Lugt 657
medium: Charcoal heightened with white chalk on grey laid paper
provenance: Atelier Degas, Lugt 657, Paris (until 1919; his estate sale, Lugt 658, Georges Petit Gallery, Paris, atelier sale III, April 7-9, 1919, no. 164.2). Marcel Guérin, Paris (d. 1948). [Charles E. Slatkin Galleries, New York by 1958-59; sold in February to Daniels]; David Daniels, New York (1959-72; gave to MIA)
title: The Violinist
